hreflang.title: HREF Language
hreflang.description: The HREF language to use when listing alternates according to [RFC 5988](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc5988).

title: Sitemap Language

source.title: Source
source.description: The source resource path to get records from. These records should at least contain a path property.

destination.title: Path
destination.description: The destination resource path to store sitemap to.

alternate.title: Alternate
alternate.description: How to compute the respective path in that language. If not present, paths do not contain a language specific part.
